data.name: MouseWheelBehavior
desc: describes the scroll behavior of the mouse wheel for a control

items.name: SCROLL_DISABLED
lines: defines that the mouse wheel cannot be used to scroll through the control's content

items.name: SCROLL_FOCUS_ONLY
lines: defines that the mouse can only be used to scroll through the control's content if it currently has the focus.

items.name: SCROLL_ALWAYS
lines: defines that the mouse can be used to scroll through the control's content, no matter whether or not it has the focus, as long as the mouse pointer is over the control.
